perturbation.original_text:
3.
Entire Agreement. The terms and conditions herein contained constitute the entire agreement between the Parties with
respect to the subject matter of this Sub-Reseller Agreement and supersede any previous and contemporaneous agreements
and understandings, whether oral or written, between the Parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.
Resale Rights. SFDC hereby appoints SUB-RESELLER (“Sub-Reseller”) as a sub-reseller to whom Reseller may resell
Services in accordance with Section 2(ii) of the Agreement, provided that Sub-Reseller may only resell such Services to
Customer. Reseller must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller as if Sub-
Reseller were an original party to the Agreement and any breach by Sub-Reseller of the Agreement will be deemed a breach
by Reseller. Sub-Reseller is not be a third-party beneficiary of the Agreement.
3.
Entire Agreement. The terms and conditions herein contained constitute the entire agreement between the Parties with
respect to the subject matter of this Sub-Reseller Agreement and supersede any previous and contemporaneous agreements
and understandings, whether oral or written, between the Parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof.
Reseller must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller.
perturbation.explanation: By embedding the term 'Reseller must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller' inside of the 'Entire Agreement' clause, its enforceability is diminished by implying it only applies to the understanding of the agreement, rather than being a stand-alone legal necessity.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Clear and Conspicuous Disclosure

perturbation.original_text:
3.
Entire Agreement. The terms and conditions herein contained constitute the entire agreement between the Parties with
respect to the subject matter of this Sub-Reseller Agreement and supersede any previous and contemporaneous agreements
and understandings, whether oral or written, between the Parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.
Entire Agreement. This Sub-Reseller Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, including facsimiles or scanned
copies sent via email or otherwise, each of which will be deemed to be a duplicate original, but all of which, taken together,
will be deemed to constitute a single instrument.The terms and conditions herein contained constitute the entire agreement between the Parties with
respect to the subject matter of this Sub-Reseller Agreement and supersede any previous and contemporaneous agreements
and understandings, whether oral or written, between the Parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof.
perturbation.explanation: By sandwiching the entire agreement clause with the 'Counterparts' clause, there is potential to weaken the enforceability by it appearing related to the formatting of the counterpart rather than a central tenet.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Clear and Conspicuous Disclosure

perturbation.original_text:
2.
Effect of Sub-Reseller Agreement. Subject to the above modifications, the Agreement remains in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.
Counterparts. This Sub-Reseller Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, including facsimiles or scanned
copies sent via email or otherwise, each of which will be deemed to be a duplicate original, but all of which, taken together,
will be deemed to constitute a single instrument. Subject to the above modifications, the Agreement remains in full force and effect.
perturbation.explanation: By attaching the original clause on the effect of the sub-reseller agreement to the counterparts section, there is potential to weaken the enforceability by relating it to the the counterparts rather than the contract itself.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Clear and Conspicuous Disclosure
